# exercises spectral analysis

By simultating time series, using lengths 100, 1000 and 10000, estimate the
spectral density by using `spectrum`, for

1. a white noise process 
1. a random walk process
1. an AR(1) process with parameter 0.8 (simulate, using lengths 100, 1000 and 10000)
1. an AR(1) process with parameter -0.8 (simulate, using lengths 100, 1000 and 10000)
